title: Haley to Abbas: U.S. "ready to talk, but we will not chase after you"
text:
Haley to Abbas: U.S. "ready to talk, but we will not chase after you" 12:51pm EST - 02:19 
U.S. Ambassador to the United Nations Nikki Haley told Palestinian President Mahmoud Abbas on Tuesday, during a U.N. Security Council Middle East meeting, that U.S. negotiators were ''ready to talk.'' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
